parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp to find submissions in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Form to find submissions in. If none provided, can only use Kapp Fields in search query

parameter.label: Form Type
parameter.tooltip: The Type of Form to find submissions in.

parameter.label: Core State
parameter.tooltip: Searches for submissions that have a core state that matches this parameter. If no value is provided, the results will contain submissions in all core states.

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: Limit the number of results returned. If not provided, the server will limit the results to 25 submissions. Maximum limit 1000

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: Query to use to fetch submissions. (i.e values[First Name]="Fred")

parameter.label: Timeline
parameter.tooltip: Date property to search by. The default value is createdAt.

parameter.label: Direction
parameter.tooltip: Result Set sorting direction. The default value is descending.

parameter.label: Start Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: Start date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Format should be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: End Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: End date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Formatshould be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: Next Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the page of submissions to return. The submission that matches this value will not be included in the results.

parameter.label: Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to update

parameter.label: Updated - Core State
parameter.tooltip: The submissions core state

parameter.label: Updated - Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: The page to set the submission to

parameter.label: Updated - Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: The direction of the next page (next or previous)

parameter.label: Updated - Origin Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the submissions origin

parameter.label: Updated - Parent Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the submissions parent

parameter.label: Updated - Values JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON representation of the submissions values

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp to create the submission in

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Form to create the submission in

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: The page to set the submission to

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: The direction of the next page (next or previous)

parameter.label: Values JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON Map of values to set into the submissions fields

parameter.label: Origin Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the submissions origin to another Kinetic Submission

parameter.label: Parent Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the submissions parent to another Kinetic Submission

parameter.label: Submit Submission
parameter.tooltip: True or False, if Submission should be Submitted when created

parameters.parameter:
<%= values = JSON.parse(@inputs['Input JSON'])
required_keys = [ "title", "startdate", "starttime", "endtime", "testschedule_id", "custevent_room_selected", # "custevent_location_name", "internal_id" ] required_values = required_keys.all? {|s| (values.key? s)}
room_id = JSON.parse(@results['Get Room']['Submissions List JSON'])[0]['values']['Room Id'] location_id = JSON.parse(@results['Get Room']['Submissions List JSON'])[0]['values']['Location Id'] location_name = JSON.parse(@results['Get Room']['Submissions List JSON'])[0]['values']['Location Name'] room_name = JSON.parse(@results['Get Room']['Submissions List JSON'])[0]['values']['Room Name'] schedule_id = JSON.parse(@results['Get Test Schedule']['Submissions List JSON'])[0]['id'] schedule_status = JSON.parse(@results['Get Test Schedule']['Submissions List JSON'])[0]['values']['Schedule Status']
if required_values { "Event Id"=>values['internal_id'], "Title"=>values['title'], "Start Date"=>Date.strptime(values['startdate'], '%m/%d/%Y').strftime("%Y-%m-%d"), #"startdate":"05/01/2023" "End Date"=>Date.strptime(values['enddate'], '%m/%d/%Y').strftime("%Y-%m-%d"), #"enddate":"05/01/2023" "Start Time"=>Time.parse(values['starttime']).strftime('%R'), #"Start Time": "13:30" "End Time"=>Time.parse(values['endtime']).strftime('%R'), #"End Time": "15:30" "Date Bucket" => @results['Calculate Date Bucket']['output'], "Test Schedule ID" =>values['testschedule_id'], "Room"=>room_name, "Room Id"=>[room_id], "Location"=>location_name, "Location Id"=>location_id, "Test Schedule Submission Id"=>schedule_id, 'Recurring' => "daily", "Schedule Status" => schedule_status, }.to_json else {"error"=>"A required value is missing from the Calendar Event data. The record could not be created."}.to_json end %>

parameter.label: Type:
parameter.tooltip: How many dependents must be completed before continuing?

parameter.label: Number:
parameter.tooltip: If some, how many?

parameter.label: Error Message
parameter.tooltip: Error Message

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: Limit the number of results returned. If not provided, the server will limit the results to 25 submissions. Maximum limit 1000

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: Query to use to fetch submissions. (i.e values[First Name]="Fred")

parameter.label: Timeline
parameter.tooltip: Date property to search by. The default value is createdAt.

parameter.label: Direction
parameter.tooltip: Result Set sorting direction. The default value is descending.

parameter.label: Start Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: Start date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Format should be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: End Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: End date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Formatshould be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: Next Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the page of submissions to return. The submission that matches this value will not be included in the results.

parameters.parameter:
<%= require 'time'
start_time_string = JSON.parse(@results['Build Start-End Date-Times']['output'])['start_date'] end_time_string = JSON.parse(@results['Build Start-End Date-Times']['output'])['end_date']
# # Generates the buckets for each day, month, and year between # the start and end times. # buckets = [];
## Get the start and end dates start = Time.parse(start_time_string)#.utc end_time = Time.parse(end_time_string)#.utc
## Patterns yearPattern = "%Y" monthPattern = "%Y-%m" dayPattern = "%Y-%m-%d" #hourPattern = "%Y-%m-%d-%H"
## Get the start month and year buckets lastBucketDay = start.strftime(dayPattern) lastBucketMonth = start.strftime(monthPattern) lastBucketYear = start.strftime(yearPattern)
## Add the start buckets #buckets.push(start.strftime(hourPattern)) buckets.push(lastBucketDay) buckets.push(lastBucketMonth) buckets.push(lastBucketYear) ## Add the end buckets #if (start.strftime(hourPattern) < end_time.strftime(hourPattern)) # buckets.push(end_time.strftime(hourPattern)) #end if (start.strftime(dayPattern) < end_time.strftime(dayPattern)) buckets.push(end_time.strftime(dayPattern)) end if (start.strftime(monthPattern) < end_time.strftime(monthPattern)) buckets.push(end_time.strftime(monthPattern)) end if (start.strftime(yearPattern) < end_time.strftime(yearPattern)) buckets.push(end_time.strftime(yearPattern)) end
# Add each day bucket in between the start and end #while ((start+=(60*60)).strftime(hourPattern) < end_time.strftime(hourPattern)) while ((start+=(60*60)).strftime(dayPattern) < end_time.strftime(dayPattern)) #buckets.push(start.strftime(hourPattern)) # Add each new day bucket if (start.strftime(dayPattern) < end_time.strftime(dayPattern) && start.strftime(dayPattern) > lastBucketDay) lastBucketDay = start.strftime(dayPattern) buckets.push(lastBucketDay) end # Add each new month bucket if (start.strftime(monthPattern) < end_time.strftime(monthPattern) && start.strftime(monthPattern) > lastBucketMonth) lastBucketMonth = start.strftime(monthPattern) buckets.push(lastBucketMonth) end # Add each new year bucket if (start.strftime(yearPattern) < end_time.strftime(yearPattern) && start.strftime(yearPattern) > lastBucketYear) lastBucketYear = start.strftime(yearPattern) buckets.push(lastBucketYear) end end
# Sort and removing duplicates buckets.sort! buckets.uniq!
buckets.to_json %>

<%= values = JSON.parse(@inputs['Input JSON']) #start_date = DateTime.parse(values['startdate']) #end_date = DateTime.parse(values['enddate']) start_date = Date.strptime(values['startdate'], '%m/%d/%Y').strftime("%Y-%m-%d") end_date = Date.strptime(values['enddate'], '%m/%d/%Y').strftime("%Y-%m-%d") { 'start_date' => start_date, 'end_date' => end_date }.to_json %>

parameters.parameter: A Test Schedule with Id <%=JSON.parse(@inputs['Input JSON'])['testschedule_id']%> was not found in Kinetic Calendar.
